properties.name: ktha.system.home-server-endpoint
properties.description: Endpoint for central ktha home server - format: http://<ip or address>:<port>

properties.name: ktha.system.timeout-between-reads
properties.description: Timeout for sensor readings, in milliseconds

properties.description: PWM actuators for PWM controll applications. Pins use WiringPi-Numbering!

properties.description: RCSwitch actuators for RF switching applications. Pins use WiringPi-Numbering!

properties.name: ktha.actuators.gpio
properties.description: GPIO actuators for gpio switching applications. Pins use WiringPi-Numbering!
